description: This Java source file defines a generic base class 'ManagerFactoryBase' used for creating and managing API manager instances with support for public and private interfaces via dynamic proxies.

classes.name: ManagerFactoryBase
classes.description: A generic base class for creating API manager instances with public/private interface support using dynamic proxies.

methods.name: ManagerFactoryBase
methods.description: Constructor for the ManagerFactoryBase class, initializes interfaces and invocation handler.

methods.name: getAPIInstance
methods.description: Returns a singleton instance of the managed API, creating a proxy if necessary.

methods.name: getProxyInstance
methods.description: Static helper method to create proxy instances that expose specified interfaces with optional private interface support.
